comments.body: Having these constants here does not make sense. Better to have them in an object KafkaOffsets and put these numbers in them.

comments.body: I dont see the need for this class. LATEST and EARLIEST is better put in object KafkaOffsets (trait already exists), and the other methods used to be part KafkaSource and may continue to be in their (unless anybody else uses it)
